summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Quickliner For Eyes Intense has all the intensity of liquid liner in a richly pigmented, automatic pencil.
details: DetailsBenefitsSilky formula glides on.Stays on all day.Never needs sharpening."Smoke" with the smudge tip on the opposite end.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2221131How To UseSwivel eyeliner up only 1/8-inch (pencil does not retract to avoid exposing formula to air, which is drying). Line eyes. Use the tool on the opposite end to gently smudge colour to desired effect. Allow colour to set for 60 seconds to ensure transfer-resistance. Recap securely after using to protect the silky formula. Can be used alone or over eye shadow.Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips.IngredientsIsododecane, Cyclopentasiloxane, PEG / PPG-19 / 19 Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Nylon-12, C20-40 Alcohols, Perfluorononyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate / Polyhydroxystearate / Sebacate, Polyethylene, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Mica, Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Carmine (CI 75470), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Aluminum Powder (CI 77000), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Ultramarines (CI 77007).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swivel eyeliner up only 1/8-inch (pencil does not retract to avoid exposing formula to air, which is drying). Line eyes. Use the tool on the opposite end to gently smudge colour to desired effect. Allow colour to set for 60 seconds to ensure transfer-resistance. Recap securely after using to protect the silky formula. Can be used alone or over eye shadow.Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain: Iron Oxides (

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Liner goes on smooth and even. Has a great blending tool to smooth the outlines!!  Bought 3 of them and will definitely buy again!!

reviews.headline: Love it.
reviews.comments: Love this eyeliner, it stays on and doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. Would recommend.

reviews.headline: Best eye liner on the market!!
reviews.comments: I have tried sooo many eye liners!!!  ALL of the Clinique liners are fabulous!!They glide on smooth and effortlessly, dry quickly as not to smudge.  All day hold.  Try this - you won't be disappointed. I have very sensitive eyes - no issues, here.

reviews.headline: I won't go a day without it!
reviews.comments: I have worn this eyeliner for 20 years. It's easy to use and easy to smudge for a smoky look. I won't go a day without it!

reviews.headline: Stays all day
reviews.comments: I love Clinique, I worked for them a long time ago and this is one product I have never quit using. They are so easy to apply and versatile. I can get an ultra thin line or heavier, great for your waterline, they smudge nicely but once it sets, it stay put all day.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this Quickliner again
reviews.comments: The only negative is the retractable...it has come off on the past 2 eyeliners I have purchased but the eyeliner itself is excellent, goes on smoothly and lasts all day.

reviews.headline: Top notch!
reviews.comments: Never smudges and the color is amazing!

reviews.headline: Clinique liner
reviews.comments: Easy stay put formula - would buy again !

reviews.headline: Like this product
reviews.comments: Stay thru a day

reviews.headline: Beautiful color and glides across the eyelid
reviews.comments: My headline says it all.  Being of a certain age, I don't want black or harsh looking liner.  This liner is a perfect darker gray with just a bit of sparkle ... no drama.  And, it glides rather than drags across the eyelid.  Stays all day.

reviews.headline: Love it!!!!
reviews.comments: Ever since my first time using this awesome liner I've never bought another. It's perfect pigment and staying power

reviews.headline: Stay put liner
reviews.comments: Very satisfied with this pencil.  Stays put all day and makes eyes pop

reviews.headline: My favorite eyeliner
reviews.comments: These are my favorite brand of eyeliner. It goes on smooth and lasts all day. Easy to apply. My only complaint is that it only turns one way - so if you click out too much, you can't put it back.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again.
reviews.comments: Very easy to apply, glides on easily.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again.
reviews.comments: Love this scent, will wear it in the evening and special occasions.

reviews.headline: My favorite eyeliner
reviews.comments: I would have given it five stars but it doesn't seem to glide on as easily as I'd like.  Other than that, once on, it has full coverage and lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Didn't use everyday and this lasted just a little over two months. Worked okay but I'll have to pass next time.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: The color is great and the pencil glides easily so you are not tugging on the eye area.  It was so easy to to blend and diffuse for a soft look. Love it!

reviews.headline: Love this eyeliner
reviews.comments: I tried a lot of different eye liners after Estee Lauder discontinued the one I wore for years. This has been the best! Great color, I have intense chocolate, glides on easily, stays on all day, and the smudger is awesome

reviews.headline: Multiple Purchases Of Product
reviews.comments: I love it! I have purchased this product multiple times. It wears well and is easy to apply. The only negative is that there is not enough in the pencil for the amount of money that it costs.

media.headline: Love this liner my fave!
media.caption: A picture of me with quick liner on top and bottom

faceoff_positive.comments: My eyes are green in the center with a blue ring on the outside. One of my eyes is a prosthetic, recently fitted after my eye stopped working and was removed; it was injured many years ago and didn't look exactly like the right one. My prosthetic is so good no one can tell. Since I haven't worn eye liner in ages awaiting surgery, I was SOOO looking forward to it. My eyelids are oily and while the cream shapers held up okay and I liked the shimmer in them a lot (I still like Black Diamond, Starry Plum, and Egyptian), they would sometimes smudge in the summer heat and one eye might have no line by the end of the day. Now that it is cooler our heater works overtime at work, so still smudging a tad. The regular quickliners are okay but they don't make my eyes stand out; they had color but were bright, rather than deep, more like wearing eyeshadow than a liner. So I finally ordered Ivy and got it today. It is gorgeous - deep and dark but not like a dark black (although that looks good on me too, but I wanted green to make my new eyes pop! and to be less intense for work) and I'll probably order more colors. With my Black Honey creamwear blush stick, my Peacock eyeshadow, and my bountiful blush/woppin' watermelon chubby stick combination, I am a force to be reckoned with! AWEsome! Thanks, Clinique, for giving me back my confidence to really do up my eyes the way I used to!
faceoff_positive.headline: So glad I ordered - IVY rocks!

faceoff_negative.comments: This is a great product. I love the intensity, ease of use and long-lasting wear. However, as a contact lens wearer, it took me some time to figure out what was wrong with my eyes. My vision was blurry and contact lenses cloudy to the point where I could barely see. As I wear the regular quickliner, it took me a while to determine that it was only happening on the days I wore the Intense. I wear gas permeable rigid lenses. I'm so disappointed that I can't use the Quickliner Intense.
faceoff_negative.headline: Beware Contact Lens Wearers
